thread.title: Ranveer Singh And Alia Bhatt Are Looking "Faarward" To Working With Each Other In "Gully Boy"
thread.title_full: Ranveer Singh And Alia Bhatt Are Looking "Faarward" To Working With Each Other In "Gully Boy"

title: Ranveer Singh And Alia Bhatt Are Looking "Faarward" To Working With Each Other In "Gully Boy"
text:
facebook 335 SHARES 
Just yesterday we broke the news about Ranveer Singh and Alia Bhatt teaming up for Zoya Akhtar's Gully Boy . The film is to be produced by Zoya's own, and brother Farhan Akhtar and Ritesh Sidhwani's, production houses. The film is set to follow the lives of Bombay street rappers, inspired by two of India's most famous stars, Naezy and Divine. After the news of the film broke, Ranveer put up a video on Instagram, talking about how excited he was to be working with Alia. In the video, he uses a filter with the face of an old uncle, and even dons a corresponding voice, talking about how Alia is one of his favourite actors from the "younger lot", and how he is looking "faarward" to work with her. Everybody loves @aliaabhatt ! Looking faarward ! A video posted by Ranveer Singh (@ranveersingh) on Feb 8, 2017 at 10:29am PST 
And Alia, being the sport that she is, responded to his post on Twitter, saying how much everyone loves Ranveer, and that she too, is looking forward to working with him. Can't wait to see them in action! Hahahah everybody totally loves @RanveerOfficial !!!! Looking double faarward GULLY BOY :) ❤️❤️❤️ https://t.co/xc55UeYhpC
